tweet: No matter how you slice it, NSO’s Pegasus spy software facilitates deplorable invasions of privacy. That’s the entire purpose of this Israeli outfit’s software. It has already been allegedly used to hack 37 reporters, activists, & executives.

Bitcoin's price shot up 16.7% to $39544/BTC yesterday. Rumors that Amazon might accept Bitcoin as payment fueled the move. This is how prices of speculative assets with inelastic supply functions behave. It only takes a tiny bit of news for prices to soar or plunge.
